name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a highly skilled Senior R&D Engineer with over 8 years of experience, I excel in C++ and C programming for developing advanced solutions. My strong command of GIT for version control ensures efficient team collaboration and project management. I also possess in-depth knowledge of **MFC** (Microsoft Foundation Class) for building user interfaces and have practical experience working with **STM32** microcontrollers and **electronics** to drive innovative product development. 
While focusing on performance and security, I bring a wealth of expertise in full-stack development with **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **Python**, along with frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, and **Node.js**. My background includes the implementation of cloud solutions on **Azure** and **AWS**, as well as experience in creating enterprise-grade platforms integrating AI/ML capabilities. 
In addition, I have a solid foundation in microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation, adept at ensuring compliance with standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. My hands-on experience includes developing machine learning pipelines and implementing effective MLOps workflows.
